subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The veteran pitcher, who is vying for a spot in the starting rotation, had an impressive showing against a Braves lineup that included Martin Prado, Chipper Jones and Dan Uggla.
snippet: The veteran pitcher, who is vying for a spot in the starting rotation, had an impressive showing against a Braves lineup that included Martin Prado, Chipper Jones and Dan Uggla.
